Interface ResourceReader<T>

All Superinterfaces:
ResourceIO<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractResourceReader, ChemistryDataReader, CrossRef, CSVTimeSeriesReader, DrugBankReader, ElevationReader, ETOPOElevationReader, FactbookReader, FASTAParser, FASTAReader, FASTQParser, FbxMeshReader, FinancialMarketReader, GBIFTaxonomy, GeoJSONReader, GoogleElevationReader, HorizonsEphemerisReader, ICD10Reader, NASAExoplanetsReader, NCBITaxonomy, NCBITaxonomyReader, NMEAReader, ObjMeshReader, OpenWeatherReader, PDBReader, PeriodicTableReader, SIMBADReader, SRTMElevationReader, StarReader, StlMeshReader, UniProtReader, VirusReader, VizieRReader, WorldBankReader
public interface ResourceReader<T> extends ResourceIO<T>
Interface for components that read/load resources. Replaces InputLoader.
